MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the PR9 postcode area of Southport affecting properties in Roselea Drive and the surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 9:57am. Our engineers have arrived on site to investigate the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:25am on the 29th April 2021.
